Function reference

Data Sets

The data sets included in the package.

comms_data
Classification Scheme of Communities
comms_demo conval_demo
Sample Characteristics
conval_comms
Community phrases for the Dataset conval_data
conval_data
Content Validity of Tests for Psychological Sense of Community
chavis_dist omoto_dist jason_dist halamova_dist
Distance Matrices of Community Effects

Table Data

Prepares the date to be used in a LaTeX table environment

make_table_body()
LaTeX Tabular Body

Plot Data

Prepares the data in the format for the corresponding plot_*function.

make_compjitter()
Plot Data for Pairwise Distribution Overlap
make_dp_prcjitter()
Plot Data for a Posterior Retrodictive Check
make_dp_prcstats()
Plot Data for a Posterior Retrodictive Check
make_gammapointrange()
Plot Data for Community Effects
make_hypo_prcstats()
Plot Data for a Posterior Retrodictive Check
make_hypopointrange()
Plot Data for Testing the Hypotheses
make_lambdapointrange()
Plot Data for Cluster Probabilities
make_logclusterdensities()
Plot Data for Cluster Densities
make_mds_plotdata()
Plot Data for MDS Configuration
make_prcjitter()
Plot Data for a Posterior Retrodictive Check
make_prcstats()
Plot Data for a Posterior Retrodictive Check
make_samplepointrange()
Plot Data for Evaluating Sample Representativity
make_sigmapointrange()
Plot Data for Variance components
make_thetapointrange()
Plot data for community probabilities

Plots

Plots the data from the corresponding make_*function.

plot_compjitter()
Plot Pairwise Distribution Overlapping
plot_dp_prcjitter()
Plot Posterior Retrodictive Check
plot_dp_prcstats()
Plot Posterior Retrodictive Check
plot_gammapointrange()
Plot Community Effects
plot_hypo_prcstats()
Plot Posterior Retrodictive Check
plot_hypopointrange()
Plot Hypotheses Testing
plot_lambdapointrange()
Plot Cluster Probabilities
plot_logclusterdensities()
Plot Cluster Densities
plot_mds()
Plot MDS Configuration
plot_prcjitter()
Plot Posterior Retrodictive Check
plot_prcstats()
Plot Posterior Retrodictive Check
plot_samplepointrange()
Plot Sample Characteristics
plot_sigmapointrange()
Plot Variance Components
plot_thetapointrange()
Plot Community Probabilities

Statistics

Calculates useful statistics.

calc_drawsoverlap()
Calculate Distribution Overlap
calc_drawswasserstein()
Wasserstein Distance
calc_hdr()
Calculate the Highest Density Region
calc_meddelta_gammas()
Median Centered Effects
calc_poolstats()
Pooling Factors for a Multilevel Model
calc_semci()
Standard Error of Measurement and Confidence Intervals
tabulate_paic()
Pairwise Relative AIC Comparison
transform_procrustes()
Procrustes Transformation of MDS Configuration

Simulations

Simulates data.

sim_sampleprobs()
One Replication of Sample Probabilities

Stan Models

Fits the Stan models.

stan_dissmodel()
Fit Doctoral Dissertation's Stan Models
